text: Tum per murda aur (baha hua) khoon aur sooar ka gosht aur her woh cheez jiss per Allah kay siwa doosron ka naam pukara gaya ho haram hai phir jo majboor hojaye aur hadd say barhney wala aur ziyadti kerney wala na ho uss per inn kay khaney mein koi gunah nahi Allah Taalaa baksish kerney wala meharban hai
